name: Pro-Composition
author: CharaForge
description: An advanced DataPack for precise control over scene composition, using a highly granular, Danbooru-style prompt structure. Ideal for power users who want to define every aspect of the generated image.

promptTemplates.name: Full Composition Prompt
promptTemplates.template: {count}, ({raceClass}), solo, full body, {pose}, {action}, {camera}, {background}, {effects}, {art_style}, {color_palette}, {resolution}, {masterpiece_quality}, {detail_level}, illustration, high resolution, {style_reference}, {wallpaper_quality}, {sharpness}, {lighting_style}

raceClass.label: Naga Warrior
raceClass.value: Naga Warrior, serpentine lower body, long muscular snake tail, tall and sinuous frame, bronze skin

raceClass.label: Cyborg Ninja
raceClass.value: Cyborg Ninja, glowing cybernetic lines, muscular build

raceClass.label: Gothic Vampire
raceClass.value: Gothic Vampire, pale skin, sharp features

eyes.label: Glowing Golden Eyes
eyes.value: glowing golden eyes with slit pupils

clothing.label: Black Velvet Coat
clothing.value: black velvet coat, hip vent, high collar

pose.label: Powerful Stance
pose.value: standing in a powerful and enigmatic pose, arms at sides, head tilted

art_style.label: 2D-HD Style
art_style.value: 2D-HD style, 32-bit color palette, crisp edges, no anti-aliasing

art_style.label: Anime CG
art_style.value: anime CG, official art, game CG

masterpiece_quality.label: Masterpiece
masterpiece_quality.value: masterpiece, best quality, amazing quality, very detailed
